oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Reaction of isoeugenol with formaldehyde in basic medium: Formation of trans-4-(4-hydroxy-3-hydroxymethyl-5-methoxy)-5-methyl-1,3-dioxane and its transformation into the tricyclo[5.2.2.0(2,6)] undecane system
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SINGH, V
PRATHAP, S
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Formation of the title compound 3, via an unusual Prins-type reaction on isoeugenol with formaldehyde in alkaline medium, and its conversion into a tricyclo[5.2.2.0(2,6)] undecane system 4 is described.
